name: Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie
description:
Let the quest begin once more!  Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie is now available for download!

Gundham Tanaka, the Supreme Overlord of Ice, awakens one morning to embark on a quest.  A truly calamitous quest for one of the greatest treasures known to the nine realms - coochie.

Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie is a Danganronpa 2 fangame, and is the sequel to the 2018 fangame Korekiyo's Epic Quest for Pussy.  Here are some cool new features you can find within!

FULLY VOICE ACTED!

Holy Blue Yeti, Batman!  This game has over a thousand lines of fully voiced dialogue!  Unlike Korekiyo's Epic Quest for Pussy, however, this time around we've got a full cast of splendid and talented voice actors!  Lots of effort and care went into bringing the characters to life, and I hope you enjoy everyone's performance!

THIS GAME IS HUGE!

Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie has more than two hours* of heart pounding battles, wicked jokes, and hilarious interactions!  And that's just the main story - there's plenty more content to enjoy on the side!

*I'd consider this huge for this kind of project.  Feel free to disagree with me.  You won't hurt my feelings, I promise.

SUPER SIDEQUESTS!

There's plenty to do on Jabberwock Island when you're not on the hunt for some coochie.  Whether you're going out of your way to make sure Fuyuhiko has the worst day ever or collecting all ten Hidden Usamis, this game's a lot more than a single hallway with a few jokes along the way!  Take your time and enjoy all that Gundham's Calamitous Quest for Coochie has to offer!

MEGA MOVES!

Let me tell you - if I had wanted to sit around and write jokes for three months, I would have moved to LA or gotten verified on Twitter.   This wouldn't be an RPG if it was all jokes - practically everyone on Jabberwock Island is fishing for a fight.  Thankfully, Gundham and his thralls have plenty of powerful and satisfying moves at their disposal.  Have fun experimenting with moves such as Chiaki's primer attacks or Teruteru's dishes to lay some serious smackdown!  After all, you're gonna need to put up a good fight if you really want to complete this quest.

NO SPOILERS (sorta)!

This game contains no spoilers for Danganronpa 2!  Sorta.  In order to complete your quest, you're gonna have to travel all over Jabberwock Island, which may lead you to some islands or other areas that you normally wouldn't go to until late into DR2.  Fortunately, though, this game takes place in island mode, so nobody's dead!   And there's a good chance that nobody's gonna die!  Awesome!

While playing Danganronpa 2 isn't required to fully enjoy this game, it's highly recommended you check out Korekiyo's Quest for Pussy first, in order to understand some of the jokes and references.

VORE-FREE!

This game has no vore in it.

Additionally, nobody's actually going to be having any sex in this game.  Spoiler alert.  Nothing here is 18+, other than some profanity.

~

Thank you so much for checking out my game!  I hope you enjoy it!  Feel free to DM me on Twitter for any comments or bug reports.
